channel.title: Harper Computers Military on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Harper Computers Military on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: ok enough
item.description: so I am going to make a post not on that topic. doh! so morgan picked me up a copy of the economist. the cover is seriously the best thing ever. I think I might subscribe. I also want to subscribe to a military journal as well. I don’t know what. probably something rather conservative. something like janes - but on paper. and then maybe Mother Jones. oh and harpers (have you noticed how almost everything named harper rules?
